Planned downtime for ReviewBoard

Aug 19, 2015 â€¢ {"display_name"=>"coreyg", "login"=>"coreyg", "email"=>"coreyg@apache.org"}

The ReviewBoard vm ran out of space and despite our best
efforts to fix the space issue without restarting the service, that is
the only option left.

The plan is to restart the vm on
Thursday August 20th at 21:00 UTC (14:00 PDT), but if it fills up again
before then, the resize will take place earlier.

A tweet via @infrabot will be tweeted 1 hour before the scheduled downtime and a planned maintenance notice will be posted to status.apache.org.

The actual downtime should take no more than 30 minutes.

The next email about this will be after the service has resumed from the planned downtime.

Thanks!

Geoff Corey
